title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 31 December 2012 - XWiki
content:
<npm\_> has joined #xwiki

08:48 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:57 <tmortagne> has quit  
08:58 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:58 <tmortagne> has quit  
08:59 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:59 <tmortagne> has left #xwiki  
08:59 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:00 <tmortagne> has left #xwiki  
09:14 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:20 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:20 <vmassol> good morning  
09:21 <vmassol> guys, we have 4 blockers for 4.4 final: http://jira.xwiki.org/secure/IssueNavigator.jspa?reset=true&jqlQuery=fixVersion+%3D+%224.4%22+and+resolution+%3D+Unresolved  
09:22 <vmassol> the 4.4 release is planned for this thursday so that gives us very little time to fix those  
09:23 <vmassol> so we need to 1/ decide if we want to fix them for 4.4, 2/ find who has the knowledge to fix them  
09:59 <tmortagne> what left of XWIKI-8461 is mostly a duplicate of XWIKI-8252 which is not a blocker  
10:00 <vmassol> well 8252 is a blocker for the 4.x cycle but if it's fixed in 4.5 it's fine  
10:01 <tmortagne> XWIKI-8630 is indeed not very nice but I guess it can go to 4.5 since it's not exactly a regression either  
10:01 <vmassol> 8630 looks like a regression  
10:01 <vmassol> it didn't happen before JV added wiki components stuff in 4.4  
10:01 <vmassol> so I think it's a regression  
10:01 <tmortagne> sure but it happen with wiki components  
10:01 <tmortagne> so it's not a regression for old stuff  
10:02 <vmassol> yeah sure but that's still a blocker IMO  
10:02 <vmassol> (even more)  
10:02 <tmortagne> blocker for 4.x yes  
10:02 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
10:02 <vmassol> well it's nto really a good practice to introduce a newfeature that doesn't "work" and we know about it ;)  
10:02 <vmassol> jvdrean: good morning  
10:03 <jvdrean> vmassol: hi  
10:03 <vmassol> jvdrean: would be great if you could look into XWIKI-8630  
10:03 <tmortagne> vmassol: it's not fully a wiki component issue, it's a general issue with stuff that we register dynamically based on their author  
10:04 <tmortagne> its not less visible with other stuff and wiki macros have a ugly hack for it  
10:04 <tmortagne> s/net less/ just less/  
10:04 <vmassol> can it be fixed quickly or not?  
10:04 <vmassol> and what are teh consequences?  
10:04 <tmortagne> not quickly  
10:05 <tmortagne> the direct consequence is that some wiki component are not working right after you import the  XE XAR  
10:05 <tmortagne> but they work after a restart for example  
10:06 <vmassol> ok so if we don't fix it we need to put a warning about it in the 4.4 RN  
10:06 <tmortagne> it's less visible wiki DW because the admin app is installed first so the admin user is their when importing most wiki components  
10:06 <vmassol> and fix it in 4.5  
10:08 <tmortagne> would need mflorea on XWIKI-8599 but seems pretty blocker  
10:08 <jvdrean> tmortagne: so the issue is with documents imported \_before\_ XWiki.Admin and XWiki.XWikiAdminGroup, am I getting it right ?  
10:09 <tmortagne> jvdrean: should be debugged to be sure but given the error and the fact that DW does not have the issue that's the thing that come to my mind  
10:14 <tmortagne> XWIKI-8207 is blocker when it happen but it happen almost never but no idea if it's complex to fix or not  
10:17 <tmortagne> vmassol: you included XINFRA in your link about issue without fix for  
10:17 <vmassol> tmortagne: I included all projects that have a 4.4 fixfor but I don't see any infra issue  
10:18 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/secure/IssueNavigator.jspa?reset=true&jqlQuery=fixVersion+=+%224.4%22+and+resolution+=+Unresolved  
10:18 <tmortagne> when I click on the link you gave in the mail I get all the infra issues  
10:18 <vmassol> ah mail  
10:18 <vmassol> sorry wrong context  
10:18 <vmassol> indeed they need to be excluded  
10:20 <tdelafosse> has joined #xwiki  
10:54 <vmassol> ah I broke the build yesterday, fixing  
10:54 <vmassol> I forgot to add a dep on teh new annotatedxhtml module  
10:55 <vmassol> making some functional tests fail

15:28 <vmassol> seems I'm still missing some dep in platform, fixing  
15:28 <vmassol> hmm we don't receive jenkins emails anymore  
15:29 <vmassol> http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Platform/job/xwiki-platform/3091/console  
15:29 <vmassol> "No emails were triggered."  
15:30 <vmassol> the build was successful but tests failed  
15:30 <vmassol> mabye the nex mail configuration doesn't handle this  
15:30 <vmassol> \*new  
15:30 <vmassol> I need to check that
